sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"抓住，握紧"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: take, grasp, grab, grip, clasp, clutch, snatch, seize
means: take ： 最普通用词，不带感情色彩。指用手抓、取某东西或控制某物。
grasp ： 指紧紧抓住、抓牢。
grab ： 指粗暴而急迫的抓住。
grip ： 语气比grasp强，指用手的最大力量紧紧抓住。
clasp ： 指用手紧握或用臂紧抱。
clutch ： 强调匆忙、紧急地抓、抓紧。
snatch ： 指突然抢走，侧重动作更快或更具暴力性质。
seize ： 指突然抓住某物，强调突然的猛烈动作。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"理解"之意。
means: understand ：指对事物已有彻底的认识，不仅知其性质、含义和细节，而且了解其内外的关系。
comprehend ： 较正式用词，指对较复杂的事物能透彻理解其意义。
appreciate ： 语气较弱，指对某事物或意义有充分的理解。着重有能力领悟或觉察。
apprehend ： 指知道某事物或某观念的大概意义，但未能理解其内涵意义，暗含一知半解意味。
grasp ： 从本义抓紧、抓住，引申作"理解、掌握"。

sentence.Network_en: He let the ball slip through his grasp and into the net.
sentence.Network_cn: 球从他的掌中滑出，钻进了球门。

sentence.Network_en: His hand was taken in a warm, firm grasp.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的手被热情地紧紧握住了。

sentence.Network_en: Attlee was extremely intelligent and his grasp of the situation was masterly.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿特利聪明过人，对局势的把握颇为高明。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 握字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 屈指成拳〖 fist〗 掌握〖 grasp〗 控制〖 control〗.
人体部位名称 ... hold 握住 grasp 抓住, 紧握 throw 投掷.
高中英语必修三第一单元黑体单词及注解_百度知道 ... hesitate 犹豫，迟疑不决 grasp 抓紧，抓牢 stare 凝视，盯着看.
新编大学英语单词表(第二册) - 豆丁网 ... exclusively ad. 排除其他的， 专门的 grasp v. 理解； 领会 hint n. 暗示， 示意.

list.abs: 下列何种抓握方式不需要使用对掌动作... ... 侧面捏（ lateral pinch） 钳狀抓握（ pincer grasp） 三点抓握（ three-jaw chuck grasp）.
grasp 握法grasping forceps 紧握钳grasping lungs forceps 持肺钳
...抓握反射(grasping reflex)是新生儿无条件反射的一种。当触及新生儿手掌时，立即被紧紧地抓住不放，如果让新生儿两只小手握紧一根棍棒，他甚至可以使整个身体悬挂片刻。在出生后第5周达到最强的程度，3~4个月时消.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(G) -亿城英语 ... Grasp all and lose all 贪多必失 grasp at 攫取 grasp the nettle 迎着困难上.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: perhaps related to grope

entry.def: If you grasp something, you take it in your hand and hold it very firmly.

example.ex: She was trying to grasp at something.
example.tran: 她正试图抓住什么东西。

entry.def: A grasp is a very firm hold or grip.

example.ex: His hand was taken in a warm, firm grasp.
example.tran: 他的手被热情地紧紧握住了。

entry.def: If you say that something is in someone's  grasp, you disapprove of the fact that they possess or control it. If something slips from your grasp, you lose it or lose control of it.

example.ex: The people in your grasp are not guests, they are hostages...
example.tran: 你所控制的这些人不是客人，而是人质。

example.ex: She allowed victory to slip from her grasp.
example.tran: 她让胜利从手中溜走了。

entry.def: If you grasp something that is complicated or difficult to understand, you understand it.

example.ex: The Government has not yet grasped the seriousness of the crisis...
example.tran: 政府当局还没有意识到这场危机的严重性。

example.ex: He instantly grasped that Stephen was talking about his wife.
example.tran: 他马上就明白斯蒂芬在说他的妻子。

entry.def: A grasp  of something is an understanding of it.

example.ex: They have a good grasp of foreign languages.

entry.def: If you say that something is within someone's grasp, you mean that it is very likely that they will achieve it.

example.ex: Peace is now within our grasp.

means.word_mean: 1. understanding of the nature or meaning or quality or magnitude of something;

sentences.sentence: "he has a good grasp of accounting practices"
"they kept a firm grip on the two top priorities"
"he was in the grip of a powerful emotion"
"a terrible power had her in its grasp"
"he released his clasp on my arm"
"he has a strong grip for an old man"
"she kept a firm hold on the railing"
"Do you comprehend the meaning of this letter?"

sentences.en: I could not grasp her meaning.

means.word_mean: 急切(或贪婪)地抓住，抓取，夺取

sentences.en: She grasped the letter and held it to her breast.
sentences.cn: 她急切地抓住信把它举在胸前。

sentences.en: I kept her hand in my grasp.

means.word_mean: 抓，伸手拿，想抓住；攫取(常与 at 连用)

jushi.english: I could not grasp her meaning.
He wondered whether his friends grasped that he had done his best.
jushi.chinese: 他不知道他的朋友是否清楚他已经尽了力。
